verses.verse: The <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2518>Hilkiah,<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of Benjamin: <S%H1144><s%>

To <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of his <S%H4427>reign.<s%>

It <S%H1961>came<s%> also in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H8552>end<s%> of the <S%H6249>eleventh<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the carrying <S%H1540>away<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> captive in the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>

Before <S%H2962><s%> I <S%H3335>formed<s%> thee in the <S%H990>belly<s%> I <S%H3045>knew<s%> thee; and <S%H2962>before<s%> thou camest <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>womb<s%> <S%H7358><s%> I <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> thee, and I <S%H5414>ordained<s%> thee a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> unto the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>Say<s%> <S%H408>not,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am a <S%H5288>child:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou shalt <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I shall <S%H7971>send<s%> thee, and <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> thee thou shalt <S%H1696>speak.<s%>

Be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of their <S%H4480>faces:<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H854>with<s%> thee to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H5060>touched<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> in thy <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

See, <S%H7200><s%> I have <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6485>set<s%> thee <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> to root <S%H5428>out,<s%> and to pull <S%H5422>down,<s%> and to <S%H6>destroy,<s%> and to throw <S%H2040>down,<s%> to <S%H1129>build,<s%> and to <S%H5193>plant.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H859>thou?<s%> And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H4731>rod<s%> of an almond <S%H8247>tree.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Thou hast <S%H3190>well<s%> <S%H7200>seen:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H8245>hasten<s%> <S%H5921><s%> my <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H6213>perform<s%> it.

And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me the second <S%H8145>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H7200>seest<s%> <S%H859>thou?<s%> And I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H5301>seething<s%> <S%H5518>pot;<s%> and the <S%H6440>face<s%> thereof is <S%H4480>toward<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H6828>north.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Out of the <S%H4480>north<s%> <S%H6828><s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall break <S%H6605>forth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2009>lo,<s%> I will <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and they shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and they shall <S%H5414>set<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H3678>throne<s%> at the <S%H6607>entering<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2346>walls<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And I will <S%H1696>utter<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%> against them <S%H5921>touching<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me, and have burned <S%H6999>incense<s%> unto <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> the <S%H4639>works<s%> of their own <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> therefore gird <S%H247>up<s%> thy <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and <S%H6965>arise,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H853>them<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee: be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H4480>faces,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> I <S%H2865>confound<s%> thee <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

For, <S%H589><s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H4013>defensed<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H5982>pillar,<s%> and <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> against the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> against the <S%H8269>princes<s%> thereof, against the <S%H3548>priests<s%> thereof, and against the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

And they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> thee; but they shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against thee; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H854>with<s%> thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> thee.
